message: Let's split it fairly. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can move on from here.
Alice, let's be real. That first offer was ridiculous. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, but remember, the pot gets smaller for you with every round.

Okay, Bob, let's compromise. I'm willing to accept a 60/40 split in your favor. This is the best I can do, considering the shrinking value of the money. It's a better deal than rejecting and risking getting nothing in the next round.
